content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"JUST-BI B.V., Laan van Zuid Hoorn 37, 2289 DC Rijswijk, the Netherlands (the \\\"Company\\\"), now part of EPAM Systems, Inc. and the EPAM Group of Companies (\\\"EPAM\\\"), is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal information. We are providing you with this Privacy Notice to explain our practices regarding the collection, use, and other processing of your personal data which means certain individually identifiable information about you (\\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"personal information\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"). For the purpose of this notice personal information will have the same meaning of ‘personal data’ as the term used in the GDPR. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Company acts as \\\"data controller\\\". This means that we are responsible for deciding the purposes for which personal data about you is processed and the means we use to carry out such processing activities.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The processing of personal data falls under the scope of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (in Dutch: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Algemene Verordening Gegevensbescherming \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(AVG)) as well as the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dutch GDPR Implementation Act \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(in Dutch: Uitvoeringswet AVG). If the terms ‘personal data’, ‘recipient’, ‘data subject’, ‘controller’, ‘processor’, ‘processing’ and ‘third party’ are used in this privacy notice, the same meaning applies as to the terms used in the GDPR and/or the Dutch GDPR Implementation Act. In an employment relationship, in principle, the employer will be referred to as the ‘controller’ and the employee will be referred to as the ‘data subject’ in terms of the GDPR.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
